item.title: Kansas City Chiefs, Philadelphia Eagles Unveil Uniforms For Super Bowl LIX
item.description: The Kansas City Chiefs will wear their road uniforms and the Philadelphia Eagles will wear their home uniforms in Super Bowl LIX in New Orleans.
